## SimplePosition interface

A position specified by the horizontal (x) and vertical (y) coordinates.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface SimplePosition 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [x](./vm-providers.simpleposition.x.md) | number | Horizontal coordinate in pixels (distance from the left) |
|  [y](./vm-providers.simpleposition.y.md) | number | Horizontal coordinate in pixels (distance from the top) |
